long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve the overall experience of playing on tenhou.net/3/ and ron2.jp/3/

Improvements:
    -widescreen support
    -objects resized
    -new animations
    -new button placements and styles
    -click feedback
    -and more

Current limitation: 
When setting a new background in Tenhou, it's still necessary to press F5 and reload the page.
